Community lending

Built for people ‚Äî not payday profits

One unified user can borrow or lend with transparent terms, message threads, and repayment tracking. No gotchas, just clarity.

No ‚Äúborrower‚Äù or ‚Äúlender‚Äù role lock-in ‚Äî you‚Äôre simply a user.

Why it works

{/* ================= FEATURES ================= */}
How it works

Simple, transparent, flexible

üìù

Create a request

Tell the community what you need, why, and for how long. No predatory fees.

ü§ù

Receive offers

Users propose terms. You choose the best offer; everything is saved to a contract.

üìà

Repay over time

Clear schedules, reminders, and a running history of payments and messages.

{/* ================= STORY STRIP ================= */}
Why PeerFund

We‚Äôve lived the paycheck-to-paycheck grind. PeerFund connects people to people‚Äî not to predatory lenders‚Äîso help and fair returns stay in the community.

{/* ================= CTA BAND ================= */}

Ready to join the community?

Create your account and explore open requests in minutes.

{/* ================= FAQ ================= */}
FAQ

Common questions

Do I need to pick a ‚ÄúBorrower‚Äù or ‚ÄúLender‚Äù role?

No. There‚Äôs just one user type. You can request or offer on any loan.

How do payments work?

Payments and payouts run through Stripe. You can link a bank, deposit to your wallet, and repay on a schedule.

Are there platform fees?

Superusers avoid the PeerFund fee. Banking/Stripe processing fees still apply.
